ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course is structured to expose one to the broader body of Aramaic literature and the studies therein. Semitic 532 01 continues where the previous semester concluded. I would suggest this course to anyone interested in Aramaic because it effectively gives one the tools to conduct research in a rather broad and under studied body of literature.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I am now aware of material that I had not been exposed to previously, with this knowledge my future research will be more qualitative and meaningful.
I think it will be immensely helpful in the future to have the confidence to approach a text and to feel comfortable using the tools and resources.
